chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (M1 state a s) sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (preDTA_produit_l a s d) sigma

Premises:
M1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> Map A
predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature -> Prop
ad = N : Set
signature = Map nat : Set
preDTA_produit_l = fix preDTA_produit_l (a : ad) (s : state) (d : preDTA) {struct d} : preDTA := match d with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a' s' => M1 state (iad_conv a a') (s_produit s s') | @M2 _ s0 s1 => match a with | 0%N => M2 state (M2 state (preDTA_produit_l 0%N s s0) (preDTA_produit_l 0%N s s1)) (M0 state) | N.pos (p'~1)%positive => M2 state (M0 state) (M2 state (preDTA_produit_l (N.pos p') s s0) (preDTA_produit_l (N.pos p') s s1)) | N.pos (p'~0)%positive => M2 state (M
preDTA = Map state : Set
state = Map prec_list : Set
predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign (M2 state d0 d1) sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma /\ predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma
predta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_compat_check d sigma = true
predta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_compat_check d sigma = true -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop
st_compat_check_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> st_compat_check s sigma = true
st_compat_check_complete : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), st_compat_check s sigma = true -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma
dta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_compat_check d sigma = true
dta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_compat_check d sigma = true -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
st_produit_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature), state_correct_wrt_sign s0 sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign s1 sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign (s_produit s0 s1) sigma
predta_produit_0 : forall (a : ad) (s : state) (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (M1 state a s) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit_l a s d) (iad_conv a0 a1) = Some (s_produit s0 s1)
st_compat_check_0_complete : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa
st_compat_check_0_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa -> st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
states_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (s s' : state), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign s' sigma -> st_compatible s s'
st_produit_r_correct_wrt_sign_invar_with_offset : forall (s0 : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M1 prec_list a p) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (s_produit_r a p s0) sigma pa
st_produit_l_correct_wrt_sign_invar_with_offset : forall (s0 : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M1 prec_list a p) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (s_produit_l a p s0) sigma pa
st_compat_check = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => st_compat_check_0 pre_ad_empty sigma s : state -> signature -> bool
predta_produit_0d_def = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (M1 state a s) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit_l a s d) (iad_conv a0 a1) = Some (s_produit s0 s1) : preDTA -> Prop
st_produit_correct_wrt_sign_invar_with_offset : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (s_produit s0 s1) sigma pa
predta_produit_1 : forall (a : ad) (s : state) (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (M1 state a s) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit_r a s d) (iad_conv a1 a0) = Some (s_produit s1 s0)
predta_compat_check = fix predta_compat_check (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) {struct d} : bool := match d with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ s => st_compat_check s sigma | @M2 _ x y => predta_compat_check x sigma && predta_compat_check y sigma end : preDTA -> signature -> bool
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M2 prec_list s0 s1) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma (pre_ad_O pa) /\ state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma (pre_ad_I pa)
state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> Prop
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> pre_ad -> Prop
predta_produit_1_def = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (M1 state a s) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit_r a s d) (iad_conv a1 a0) = Some (s_produit s1 s0) : preDTA -> Prop
semantic_equiv_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), st_reconnait d ladj t s -> dta_reconnait d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)
inter_semantics : forall (d0 d1 : DTA) (sigma : signature) (t : term), dta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma -> reconnait d0 t /\ reconnait d1 t < -> reconnait (inter d0 d1) t
dta_compat_check = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta p _ => predta_compat_check p sigma end : DTA -> signature -> bool
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
state_ref_ok = fun (s : state) (d : preDTA) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d : state -> preDTA -> Prop
st_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait d s t -> Prop
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
state_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) => exists b : ad, MapGet state d b = Some s /\ a <> b : preDTA -> state -> ad -> Prop
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
st_compat_check_0 = fix st_compat_check_0 (pa : pre_ad) (sigma : signature) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ a p => match pl_compat_check p with | Some n => match MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) with | Some m => n =? m | None => false end | None => false end | @M2 _ x y => st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_O pa) sigma x && st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_I pa) sigma y end : pre_ad -> signature -> state -> bool
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
semantic_equiv_0_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p l n = true

```  
intros d a s sigma H1 H2.
unfold predta_correct_wrt_sign in *.
intros H3 H4.  
apply predta_compat_check_complete.  
apply predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 in H3.
apply H3.
apply H4.
```

original: intros d a s sigma H1 H2. unfold predta_correct_wrt_sign in *. intros H3 H4. apply predta_compat_check_complete. apply predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 in H3. apply H3. apply H4.
